nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 17 is the seventeenth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars Adventures. The issue includes the stories "Sector 7-E," by Kevin Burke and Chris "Doc" Wyatt, and "Flight of the Falcon, Part 4: Lady and the Tramp," by Michael Moreci. Star Wars Adventures 17 was published on January 30, 2019 by IDW Publishing.

Welcome to the Resistance! In the time before The Force Awakens, this all-new adventure follows the fledgling Resistance as it begins to realize the growing threat of the First Order! Based on Star Wars Resistance, an exciting new animated series coming to Disney Channel this fall!
